sources.title: Race Street
sources.description: Title: Race Street Summary: In San Francisco, when a bookie is murdered by a protection racket syndicate, his bookie friend Dan Gannin and police lieutenant Barney Runson investigate. Directed by: Edwin L. Marin Actors: Production Company: RKO Radio Pictures Release Date: 22 June 1948 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 Nice-guy bookie Dan Gannin plans to quit the racket; he's opening a new night club with his torch-singing sister as main attraction. But Dan's best friend Hal runs afoul of "protection" crooks, and Dan goes after them like a one-man police force despite the admonishments of Lt. Barney Runson. But there's one thing Dan didn't bargain on...

metadata.Plot: Nice-guy bookie Dan Gannin plans to quit the racket; he's opening a new night club with his torch-singing sister as main attraction. But Dan's best friend Hal runs afoul of "protection" crooks, and Dan goes after them like a one-man police force despite the admonishments of Lt. Barney Runson. But there's one thing Dan didn't bargain on...
metadata.Actors: George Raft, William Bendix, Marilyn Maxwell
